text: Tight Spot is a 1955 American crime drama movie directed by Phil Karlson and was based on the 1953 play Dead Pigeon by Lenard Kantor. It stars Ginger Rogers, Edward G. Robinson, Brian Keith, Lucy Marlow, Lorne Greene, Peter Leeds, Eve McVeagh and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1955 crime drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Phil Karlson
